info.name: Upgates API
info.description:
# üöÄ √övod

Aby v√°m propojen√≠ p≈ôes API fungovalo, je zapot≈ôeb√≠ p≈ôekontrolovat, ≈æe e-shop na kter√Ω se napojujete **m√° zapnut√Ω doplnƒõk** [API](https://doplnky.upgates.cz/detail/api).

# ü§ñ Prvn√≠ krok

P≈ôejdƒõte do z√°lo≈æky **Variables** a vypl≈àte

1. **apiUser_Login** - Login u≈æivatele pro API komunikaci
    
2. **apiUser_Key** - Kl√≠ƒç u≈æivatele pro API komunikaci
    
3. **Project_URL** - URL adresa projektu pro API komunikaci
    

# üí¨ Komunikace

## Odesl√°n√≠ po≈æadavku

Tato kolekce obsahuje v≈°echny typy po≈æadavk≈Ø (POST, GET, PUT a DELETE), kter√© Upgates aktu√°lnƒõ umo≈æ≈àuje. (viz dokumentace [APIARY](https://upgatesapiv2.docs.apiary.io/))

## Zobrazen√≠ odpovƒõdi

Sledujte sekci Response, kter√© v√°m API vrac√≠. Pokud se objev√≠:

- V≈°echny stavov√© k√≥dy jsou vyps√°ny v [dokumentaci](https://upgatesapiv2.docs.apiary.io/#introduction/stavove-kody)
    

---

# ‚≠êOvƒõ≈ôen√© dopl≈àky

- Pokud jste v√Ωvoj√°≈ô, kter√Ω vytv√°≈ô√≠ [Ovƒõ≈ôen√Ω doplnƒõk](https://www.upgates.cz/a/pro-vyvojare-doplnky) nen√≠ zapot≈ôeb√≠, abyste tento doplnƒõk API, mƒõli aktivov√°n. Ovƒõ≈ôen√Ω doplnƒõk jej m√° syst√©movƒõ "aktivov√°n". V≈°echny pot≈ôebn√© informace dostanete z [Instalaƒçn√≠ho po≈æadavku](https://www.upgates.cz/a/api-dokumentace-aktivace-doplnku)
    
    - Ovƒõ≈ôen√Ω doplnƒõk, nen√≠ zapoƒç√≠t√°v√°n do [Omezen√≠ poƒçtu po≈æadavk≈Ø](https://upgatesapiv2.docs.apiary.io/#introduction/rate-limiting/omezeni-poctu-pozadavku), ale ≈ô√≠d√≠ se pouze [Best Practices](https://www.upgates.cz/a/api-dokumentace-doplnku#doplnek_bestpractices) pro tvorbu ovƒõ≈ôen√©ho dopl≈àku.

{
    "send_emails_yn": "0",
    "send_sms_yn": "0",
    "orders": [
        {
        "external_order_number": "{{orderNumber_External}}",
        "language_id": "{{languageID_CZ}}",
        "prices_with_vat_yn": "1",
        "status": "{{orderStatus_CZ_Received}}",
        "paid_date": "2025-1-1",
        "tracking_code": "{{orderNumber}}",
        "resolved_yn": "0",
        "internal_note": "Internal API note",
        "statistics_yn": "1",
        "variable_symbol": "{{orderVariableSymbol}}",
        "creation_time": "2025-1-1",
        "dimensions": {
            "width": "50",
            "length": "50",
            "height": "50"
        },
        "customer": { 
            "email": "{{customerEmail}}",
            "phone": "777777777",
            "firstname_invoice": "{{customerName}}",
            "surname_invoice": "{{customerSurname}}",
            "street_invoice": "{{customerBillingStreet}}",
            "city_invoice": "{{customerBillingCity}}",
            "state_invoice": "{{customerBillingState}}",
            "zip_invoice": "{{customerBillingZipCode}}",
            "country_id_invoice": "{{customerBillingCountryID}}",
            "postal_yn": "1",
            "firstname_postal": "Eva",
            "surname_postal": "Nov√°kov√°",
            "street_postal": "{{customerPostalStreet}}",
            "city_postal": "{{customerPostalCity}}",
            "state_postal": "{{customerPostalState}}",
            "zip_postal": "{{customerPostalZipCode}}",
            "country_id_postal": "{{customerPostalCountryID}}",
            "company_yn": "1",
            "company_postal": "70200",
            "company": "{{customerCompanyName}}",
            "ico": "{{customerCompanyNumber}}",
            "dic": "{{customerCompanyVatNumber}}",
            "vat_payer_yn": "{{customerCompanyVatPayer}}",
            "pricelist_name": "{{pricelistName_CZ}}",
            "pricelist_percent": "0",
            "customer_note": "Customer Note"
            },
        "products": [{
            "code": "{{productCode}}",
            "code_supplier": "Dodavatel",
            "ean": "123456789",
            "title": "{{productName}}",
            "quantity": "1",
            "unit": "ks",
            "price_per_unit": "430",
            "vat": "{{Vat_CZ}}",
            "buy_price": "500",
            "recycling_fee": "50",
            "weight": "4",
            "invoice_info": "invoice note",
            "parameters": [{
                "name": "{{parametersName_CZ}}",
                "value": "{{parametersValue_CZ}}"
                }]
            }],
        "quantity_discount": {
            "amount": "10",
            "type": "price"
        },
        "shipment": {
            "code": "1234",
            "name": "API Shipment",
            "price": "150",
            "vat": "21"
        },
        "payment": {
            "code": "1234",
            "name": "API Payment",
            "price": "0",
            "vat": "21"
        },
        "invoice": {
            "generate_yn": "1",
            "expiration_date": "2025-2-2",
            "date_of_issuance": "2025-1-1",
            "date_of_vat_revenue_recognition": "2025-1-1"
        },
        "receipt": {
            "generate_yn": "1",
            "expiration_date": "2025-2-2",
            "date_of_issuance": "2025-1-1",
            "date_of_vat_revenue_recognition": "2025-1-1"  
        },
        "credit_note": {
            "generate_yn": "1",
            "expiration_date": "2025-2-2",
            "date_of_issuance": "2025-1-1",
            "date_of_vat_revenue_recognition": "2025-1-1"  
        }
    ]
}
